internships.description: Worked on a website and software which automates the manual process of downloading data from the sources by using APIs and display it over the website, Created a static website(frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) and GUI of software using Python's library tinkter.

volunteer.heading: Teach For India
volunteer.description: Teach For India (TFI), a program of Teach To Lead, aims to address educational inequity by building a movement of leaders that are committed to expanding educational opportunity

volunteer.heading: PICT IEEE Student Branch
volunteer.description: PICT IEEE Student Branch (PISB) was established with an aim of inculcating a sense of technical awareness amongst its student members in PICT.
